snippet: Finding solutions to the epidemic of sexual violence in the armed forces is urgently needed.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Senate Armed Services subcommittee hearing on sexual assaults in military, first in nearly a decade; contends finding solutions to epidemic of sexual violence in armed forces is urgently needed.
lead_paragraph: Finding solutions to the epidemic of sexual violence in the armed forces is urgently needed.
